body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer. North Carolina native. Married to Lucretia Tapp Clayton. Father of Mary A. Clayton, John Clayton, Joel Clayton, Eli Clayton, Elizabeth Clayton, Sarah J. Clayton, Richard Clayton, and Nancy Clayton. Farmer in Hopkins County in 1850. Farmer in Hopkins County in 1860.
